tool_description: Generate new puzzles, solve puzzles, receive hints, find candidates, and more.
name: Sudoku Service
title: Sudoku Service

api_list.name: Create
api_list.description: Get a new Sudoku puzzle. Currently, this endpoint does not offer control over the difficulty level of the puzzle returned. It will be be made randomly, and can be anywhere from extremely easy to extremely difficult.

optional_parameters.name: withSolution
optional_parameters.description: This optional parameter can be set to true to to make the endpoint return the solution along with the puzzle.
